allow: Bash(python -c "import sys, json; data = json.load(sys.stdin); print(f""Total settings returned: {len(data[''''settings''''])}""); print(f""Summary: {data[''''summary'''']}"")")

Bash(python -c "import sys, json; data = json.load(sys.stdin); print(f""Total UNIQUE settings: {len(data[''''settings''''])}""); print(f""
Summary:""); print(f""  Compliant: {data[''''summary''''][''''compliant'''']}""); print(f""  Non-Compliant: {data[''''summary''''][''''nonCompliant'''']}""); print(f""  Not Configured: {data[''''summary''''][''''notConfigured'''']}""); print(f""
By Policy Type:""); print(json.dumps(data[''''summary''''][''''byPolicyType''''], indent=2)); print(f""
By Platform:""); print(json.dumps(data[''''summary''''][''''byPlatform''''], indent=2))")
